pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, February 1, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, February 1, 2018:

Edmonton, Alberta

Note: All times local

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Mill Woods Seniors Association.

Mill Woods Senior and Multicultural Centre‎
201 - 2610 Hewes Way NW

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11:15 a.m.

12:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Tawa Park Drainage Improvements site.

Tawa Park
Youville Drive East at 31st Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:15 p.m.

7 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

MacEwan University Sport and Wellness‎
10800 105 Ave North West

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive at the main entrance no later than 6 p.m.
  • Parking available at South Key Hole

Media appearances

  • 8:10 a.m. – A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on CBC Edmonton AM.
  • 9:05 a.m. – A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on The Ryan Jespersen Show, 630 CHED Edmonton.
